titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William A. Gaines
CWG13769

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To W. A. Gaines, Dr.
Post Master at Frankfort

row.cell:
To Post office Stamps for use of Surgeon General I. W. Scott
400. 3¢ Stamps

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services ^articles^ were rendered ^furnished^ as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

I. W. Scott
Surgn. Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 20 of July, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Twelve Dollars, and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To W. A. Gaines, Dr.
Post Master at Frankfort

row.cell:
To Post Office Stamps for use of Surgeon General I. W. Scott
400. 3¢ Stamps

body.p: The Quarter Master General is ordered to pay this out of the Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services ^articles^ were rendered ^furnished^ as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.

I. W. Scott
Surgn. Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 20 of July, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky Volunteers, the sum of Twelve Dollars and -- Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. Abstract B Qr. 186.
W. A. Gaines
Dollars 12.00/100
Paid July 20th, 1864.
15
(Militia No. 13.)
